text: læa meux di thuk klaw kæ khea hela nan wa cng sraththa tx sing thi xallxh di thrng prathan lng ma theid phwk khea k klaw wa rea kalang sraththa tx sing thi di thuk prathan lng ma kæ rea xyu læw thang «thi sing nan khux khwam cring doy yunyan sing thi mi xyu kab phwk khea cng klaw theid (muhammad) wa pheraa hetu dı meux kxn non phwk than cung kha na bi khx ngxallxh tha hak phwk than pen phu sraththa
